transcript:
What kind of ice pud- ding? I don't like ice cream." 
"Carrot ices." 
"No! What kind, Mdrya Dmftrievna? What kind?" she almost screamed; "I want to know!" 
Marya Dmftrievna and the countess burst out laughing, and all the guests joined in. Ev- eryone laughed, not at Marya Dmitrievna's an- swer but at the incredible boldness and smart- ness of this little girl who had dared to treat Marya Dmftrievna in this fashion. 
Natasha only desisted when she had been told that there would be pineapple
